guild_rolecount: There are $roleCount roles on this server
undefined_member: nope, **$member** is not a valid user(i can't count his roles)
settings_general_error_no_prefix: You must specify the new prefix
settings_general_error_no_language: You must specify the new language
settings_update: The value of __$setting__ has been updated (new value: **`$value`**)
help_dialog:
Need some help ?
Try `$prefixhelp`
(Oh! And here is my prefix: **`$prefix`**)
script_input_start:
Script For $scriptName:
(prefixed commands will be ignored and executed as regular commands)
Remember to save when you've finished(**`$prefixsave`**)
Or you can just cancel(**`$prefixcancel`**)
script_input_finish:
Saved As **$scriptName**
you can now use it as a normal command
type_script_start_reaction_listener:
Script For $emoji:
(prefixed commands will be ignored and executed as regular commands)
Remember to save when you've finished(**`$prefixsave`**)
Or you can just cancel(**`$prefixcancel`**)
reaction_listener_enabled: A new Reaction Listener just spawned!
